question: What is this website?
answer: This site was created to visualize New Zealand Commuter data as collected by NZ Statistics in the 2018 census.

question: Who created this site?
answer: Jun Kagaya built this site as an entry for the There & Back Again Data Visualization Competition

question: Who do I contact about this site?
answer: You can send an email to my email address jun.a.kagaya@gmail.com and I will try and get back to you as soon as possible.
